## üè• Health Status

### API Health Endpoints

```bash
# Development
curl https://api-dev.v-edfinance.com/api/health

# Staging
curl https://api-staging.v-edfinance.com/api/health

# Production
curl https://api.v-edfinance.com/api/health
```

**Expected Response:**
```json
{
  "status": "ok",
  "timestamp": "2026-01-04T10:30:00Z",
  "database": "connected",
  "redis": "connected",
  "version": "1.0.0"
}
```

### Web Health Check

```bash
# Check all environments
curl -I https://dev.v-edfinance.com
curl -I https://staging.v-edfinance.com
curl -I https://v-edfinance.com
```

**Expected:** HTTP 200 OK

## üõ†Ô∏è Manual Actions

### Deploy Now

```bash
# Trigger deployment via GitHub Actions UI
# https://github.com/luaho/v-edfinance/actions

# Or via API
curl -X POST \
  https://api.github.com/repos/luaho/v-edfinance/actions/workflows/deploy-dev.yml/dispatches \
  -H "Authorization: token $GITHUB_TOKEN" \
  -d '{"ref":"develop"}'
```

### Rollback

```bash
# Via GitHub Actions UI
# https://github.com/luaho/v-edfinance/actions/workflows/rollback.yml

# Or via script
DOKPLOY_API_TOKEN=xxx ./scripts/deploy/auto-rollback.sh staging
```

### View Logs

```bash
# Development
ssh user@103.54.153.248 "docker logs api-dev --tail 100"

# Staging
ssh user@103.54.153.248 "docker logs api-staging --tail 100"

# Production
ssh user@103.54.153.248 "docker logs api-production --tail 100"
```

## üîê Access Control

### Environments

| Environment | Auto-Deploy | Approval Required | Approvers |
|-------------|-------------|-------------------|-----------|
| Development | ‚úÖ Yes | ‚ùå No | All developers |
| Staging | ‚úÖ Yes | ‚ùå No | All developers |
| Production | ‚úÖ Yes | ‚úÖ Yes | @luaho, DevOps team |

### Secrets

All deployment secrets stored in GitHub Actions secrets:
- `DOKPLOY_API_TOKEN` - Dokploy API authentication
- `SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL` - Slack notifications
- Environment-specific secrets in Dokploy

**Auto-updated by:** [Update Dashboard Workflow](../.github/workflows/update-dashboard.yml)  
**Update Frequency:** Every deployment + Daily at 00:00 UTC  
**Data Source:** GitHub Actions API + Dokploy API
